title: Ohayou, Oyasumi, Aishiteru.
original_name: おはよう、おやすみ、あいしてる。
sinopse:
With their parents' approval, Makoto has started living with two good-looking brothers. The older brother, Souta, just feels like he's burdened with Makoto. But Makoto can't help but be interested in Souta... Living together under one roof, a parent-approved love begins. There is a lot of flirting every day!!

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
